item.title: WATCH: Kilmar Abrego Garcia released from criminal custody in Tennessee
item.description: The Salvadoran native has been in criminal custody since the federal government brought him back to the U.S. in June to face human smuggling charges.

item.title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia released from criminal custody
item.description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia, who was wrongly deported in March before being brought back to the U.S., was released from criminal custody in Tennessee on Frid...

item.title: WATCH: Gloria Estefan plays 'This or That' with 'GMA'
item.description: The iconic performer joined the show's Summer Concert Series and shared her "summer hot takes."

item.title: WATCH: Gloria Estefan surprised with RIAA plaque live on 'GMA'
item.description: Gloria and Emilio Estefan received career plaques celebrating more than 50 years of contributions to music and culture.

item.title: WATCH: Stocks rally as Fed Chair Jerome Powell signals rate cut
item.description: ABC News' Alexis Christoforous discusses how Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's statements affected the market.
